Articles.Content:
The image is Photoshop, but I really like the idea. Any mods that do that? Even if I have to open a window before going into the contracts window to get it.

http://i.imgur.com/lkNeKSP.png

The image is Photoshop, but I really like the idea. Any mods that do that? Even if I have to open a window before going into the contracts window to get it.

http://i.imgur.com/lkNeKSP.png

I think everyone would love that. But It seems to me like that's something squad would have to do, and wouldnt be easily doable by a mod

I know that it is possible to let a window display over the contract window. See: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108316-Rejector-v1-0-9?p=1963044#post1963044 and the post directly after it.

So all that is really needed is a mini map window that can stay on top.

I know that it is possible to let a window display over the contract window. See: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108316-Rejector-v1-0-9?p=1963044#post1963044 and the post directly after it.

So all that is really needed is a mini map window that can stay on top.

i suppose. But it would be better implemented if Squad did it
I agree it would be Ideal if Squad did it and 10000000000 other things, but for now mods will have to do.
